title: League of Legends MMO?
body:
Whats your thoughts on a League of Legends MMO? I mean Riot could do it and make quite a bit of money to keep League of Legends f2p and everything.

They have the lore, RuneTera and everything to make it if they wanted to xD

replies.body:
Nah. I'd rather them keep spending money on this game. Look, the lore is cool and all, but quite frankly idgaf about that stuff I just wanna play some league and have fun.

It might be a good idea for Telltale games to make a spin off or something, but even then, MMOs and MOBAs are very different types of game. I don't know if many people who actually play LoL would even bother downloading this game.
